ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def OnCMD_LANCFINExecute(command, entity): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Tecnologia.Common.Components import FormLinkDefinition from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Financeiro import FNLancamentoCodigoInterno
link = FormLinkDefinition() link.Url = "~/aga/e/financeiro/ContasFinanceiras/ContasFinanceiras.aspx"
command.OutputDefinition = link command.OutputDefinition.Parameters["CODIGOINTERNO"] = FNLancamentoCodigoInterno.ciOVI command.OutputDefinition.Parameters["ENTIDADEORIGEM"] = entity command.OutputDefinition.Parameters["SOMENTELEITURA"] = True
